text: Devitɨn mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavibar ziabar kara. Men faraghavɨra itim, Josep Basebet, a Takemonɨn adarazir gumazim. A 3plan mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavir kabar mav, egha a men faragha zui. A dughiar mamɨn afuzimɨn suiragha23:8 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. 800plan apaniba ko mɨsogha bar me mɨsoghezɨ, me ariaghire.
